data: “You don’t believe in psychic phenomena,” said Doctor Otto Zoberg yet again, “because you won’t.”
"You don't believe in psychic phenomena," said Doctor Otto Zoberg yet again, "because you _won't_."
“You don’t believe in psychic phenomena,” said Doctor Otto Zoberg yet again, “because you _won’t_.”
Wellman, Manly Wade, 1903-1986; Brundage, Margaret, 1900-1976 [Illustrator]; Finlay, Virgil, 1914-1971 [Illustrator]
